Trade/Device Name(s): ELITech Clinical Systems CK NAC SL
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems CK NAC SL, ELICAL 2, ELITROL I & II for quantitative creatine kinase determination, calibration, and quality control on Selectra analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative in vitro determination of creatine kinase in human serum and plasma on ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra analyzers; also for calibration and quality control of ELITech methods on Selectra analyzers; not for point of care use.
